title: Best of The Program | Guest: Kim Klacik | 7/6/20
description:
The Washington Redskins are considering changing their name. The Washington Post now says some books are worthy of cancellation. There’s something off with the Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell story: How much power did Epstein have over the government, and who could Maxwell expose? Black GOP congressional candidate Kim Klacik joins to describe a new movement toward conservatism and her goals if elected.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
